TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract Workbooks implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable

summary.span: Microsoft Excel 应用程序中当前打开的所有对象 的集合。

span.span: A collection of all the objects that are currently open in the Microsoft Excel application.

para.span: 使用 该属性可返回 Workbooks 集合。

span.span: Use the property to return the Workbooks collection.

para.span: 使用此方法 创建一个新的空工作簿，并将其添加到集合中。

span.span: Use the method to create a new, empty workbook and add it to the collection.

para.span: 使用 该方法打开文件。

span.span: Use the method to open a file.

para.span: 有关使用单个 Workbook 对象的信息，请参阅 该对象。

span.span: For more information about using a single Workbook object, see the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook Add (object Template);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook Add([in]object Template) runtime managed
Public Function Add (Optional Template As Object) As Workbook

param.name: Template
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 确定如何创建新工作簿。

span.span: Determines how the new workbook is created.

param.span: 如果此参数为指定现有 Microsoft Excel 文件名的字符串，那么创建新工作簿将以该指定的文件作为模板。

span.span: If this argument is a string specifying the name of an existing Microsoft Excel file, the new workbook is created with the specified file as a template.

param.span: 如果此参数为常量，新工作簿将包含一个指定类型的工作表。

span.span: If this argument is a constant, the new workbook contains a single sheet of the specified type.

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一 ：xlWBATChart 、xlWBATExcel4IntlMacroSheet、xlWBATExcel4MacroSheet或xlWBATWorksheet。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlWBATChart, xlWBATExcel4IntlMacroSheet, xlWBATExcel4MacroSheet, or xlWBATWorksheet.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，Microsoft Excel 将创建包含一定数目空白工作表的新工作簿（该数目由 SheetsInNewWorkbook 属性设置）。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, Microsoft Excel creates a new workbook with a number of blank sheets (the number of sheets is set by the SheetsInNewWorkbook property).
Creates a new workbook.

summary.span: 新工作表将成为活动工作表。

span.span: The new workbook becomes the active workbook.
Returns a object.

para.span: 如果 参数指定文件，则文件名可以包含路径。

span.span: If the argument specifies a file, the file name can include a path.

Read-only.

Public Function CanCheckOut (Filename As String) As Boolean

param.name: Filename
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

param.span: 要签出的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file to check out.

summary.span: 如果 Microsoft Excel 可以将指定的工作簿从服务器签出，则该值为 True。

span.span: True if Microsoft Excel can check out a specified workbook from a server.
Read/write Boolean.

param.name: Filename

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 要签出的文件的名称。

span.span: The name of the file to check out.

summary.span: 将指定的工作簿从服务器复制到本地计算机进行编辑。

span.span: Copies the specified workbook from a server to a local computer for editing.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Close ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() runtime managed
Public Sub Close ()
public: void Close();

span.span: Closes the object.

para.span: 使用 Close 方法 关闭工作簿 不会运行工作簿Auto_Close宏。

span.span: Closing a workbook using the Close method doesn't run any Auto_Close macros in the workbook.

para.span: 使用 该方法运行自动关闭宏。

span.span: Use the method to run the auto close macros.

Public ReadOnly Property Count As Integer

summary.span: 返回集合中对象的数目。

span.span: Returns the number of objects in the collection.
Read-only Integer.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator { get; }
.property instance valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlCreator Creator
Public ReadOnly Property Creator As XlCreator
public: property Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator Creator { Microsoft::Office::Interop::Excel::XlCreator get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个 32 位整数，该整数指示在其中创建了此对象的应用程序。

span.span: Returns a 32-bit integer that indicates the application in which this object was created.

summary.span: 如果该对象是在 Microsoft Excel 中创建的，则此属性返回字符串 XCEL，它等同于十六进制的数字 5843454C。

span.span: If the object was created in Microsoft Excel, this property returns the string XCEL, which is equivalent to the hexadecimal number 5843454C.
Read-only .

para.span: Creator 属性是为 Macintosh 上的 Microsoft Excel 设计的，在 Macintosh 上，每个应用程序都具有一个四字符的创建者代码。

span.span: The Creator property is designed to be used in Microsoft Excel for the Macintosh, where each application has a four-character creator code.

para.span: 例如，Microsoft Excel 的创建者代码为 XCEL。

span.span: For example, Microsoft Excel has the creator code XCEL.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook Open (string Filename, object UpdateLinks, object ReadOnly, object Format, object Password, object WriteResPassword, object IgnoreReadOnlyRecommended, object Origin, object Delimiter, object Editable, object Notify, object Converter, object AddToMru, object Local, object CorruptLoad);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook Open([in]string Filename, [in]object UpdateLinks, [in]object ReadOnly, [in]object Format, [in]object Password, [in]object WriteResPassword, [in]object IgnoreReadOnlyRecommended, [in]object Origin, [in]object Delimiter, [in]object Editable, [in]object Notify, [in]object Converter, [in]object AddToMru, [in]object Local, [in]object CorruptLoad) runtime managed

Public Function Open (Filename As String, Optional UpdateLinks As Object, Optional ReadOnly As Object, Optional Format As Object, Optional Password As Object, Optional WriteResPassword As Object, Optional IgnoreReadOnlyRecommended As Object, Optional Origin As Object, Optional Delimiter As Object, Optional Editable As Object, Optional Notify As Object, Optional Converter As Object, Optional AddToMru As Object, Optional Local As Object, Optional CorruptLoad As Object) As Workbook

param.name: Filename
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 要打开的工作簿的文件名。

span.span: The file name of the workbook to be opened.

param.name: UpdateLinks
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定更新文件中的链接的方式。

span.span: Specifies the way links in the file are updated.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则会提示用户指定链接的更新方式。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the user is prompted to specify how links will be updated.

param.span: 否则，此参数是下表中列出的值之一。如果 Microsoft Excel 以 WKS、WK1 或 WK3 格式打开文件，并且参数为 2，则 Microsoft Excel 从附加到该文件的图形中生成 图表。

span.span: Otherwise, this argument is one of the values listed in the following table.If Microsoft Excel is opening a file in the WKS, WK1, or WK3 format and the argument is 2, Microsoft Excel generates charts from the graphs attached to the file.

param.span: 如果参数为 0，则不创建图表。

span.span: If the argument is 0, no charts are created.

param.name: ReadOnly
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则以只读模式打开工作簿。

span.span: True to open the workbook in read-only mode.

param.name: Format
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果 Microsoft Excel 打开文本文件，则此参数指定分隔符字符，如下表所示。

span.span: If Microsoft Excel is opening a text file, this argument specifies the delimiter character, as shown in the following table.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前分隔符。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the current delimiter is used.

param.name: Password
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含打开受保护工作簿所需密码的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the password required to open a protected workbook.

param.span: 如果省略此参数并且工作簿需要密码，则会提示用户输入密码。

span.span: If this argument is omitted and the workbook requires a password, the user is prompted for the password.

param.name: WriteResPassword
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 包含写入写保护的工作簿所需密码的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the password required to write to a write-reserved workbook.

param.span: 如果省略此参数并且工作簿需要密码，则将提示用户输入密码。

span.span: If this argument is omitted and the workbook requires a password, the user will be prompted for the password.

param.name: IgnoreReadOnlyRecommended
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则不让 Microsoft Excel 显示只读的建议消息（如果该工作簿以建议只读选项保存）。

span.span: True to have Microsoft Excel not display the read-only recommended message (if the workbook was saved with the Read-Only Recommended option).

param.name: Origin
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果文件是文本文件，则此参数指示其来源 (以便代码页和回车/换行 (CR/LF) 可以正确映射) 。

span.span: If the file is a text file, this argument indicates where it originated (so that code pages and Carriage Return/Line Feed (CR/LF) can be mapped correctly).

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一 ：xlMacintosh、xlWindows或xlMSDOS。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlMacintosh, xlWindows, or xlMSDOS.

param.span: 如果省略此参数，则使用当前操作系统。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the current operating system is used.

param.name: Delimiter
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果文件是文本文件，并且 Format 参数为 6，则此参数是一个字符串，指定要用作分隔符的字符。

span.span: If the file is a text file and the Format argument is 6, this argument is a string that specifies the character to be used as the delimiter.

param.span: 例如，将 Chr (9) 用于选项卡、将"，"用于逗号、将";"用于分号或使用自定义字符。

span.span: For example, use Chr(9) for tabs, use "," for commas, use ";" for semicolons, or use a custom character.

param.span: 仅使用字符串的第一个字符。

span.span: Only the first character of the string is used.

param.name: Editable
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果文件是 Microsoft Excel 4.0 加载项，则此参数 为 True， 可打开该加载项，以便它是一个可见窗口。

span.span: If the file is a Microsoft Excel 4.0 add-in, this argument is True to open the add-in so that it’s a visible window.

param.span: 如果此参数为 False 或省略，则加载项将以隐藏方式打开，并且无法取消隐藏。

span.span: If this argument is False or omitted, the add-in is opened as hidden, and it cannot be unhidden.

param.span: 此选项不适用于在 Microsoft Excel 5.0 或更高版本中创建的加载项。

span.span: This option doesn't apply to add-ins created in Microsoft Excel 5.0 or later.

param.span: 如果文件是 Excel 模板，则使用 True 打开指定的模板进行编辑，使用 False 打开基于指定模板的新工作簿。

span.span: If the file is an Excel template, use True to open the specified template for editing or False to open a new workbook based on the specified template.

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Notify
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 当文件不能以可读写模式打开时，如果此参数为 True，则可将该文件添加到文件通知列表。

span.span: If the file cannot be opened in read/write mode, this argument is True to add the file to the file notification list.

param.span: Microsoft Excel 将以只读模式打开该文件并轮询文件通知列表，并在文件可用时向用户发出通知。

span.span: Microsoft Excel will open the file as read-only, poll the file notification list, and then notify the user when the file becomes available.

param.span: 如果此参数为 False 或省略，则不会请求通知，并且任何打开不可用文件的尝试都将失败。

span.span: If this argument is False or omitted, no notification is requested, and any attempts to open an unavailable file will fail.

param.name: Converter
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 打开文件时要尝试的第一个文件转换器的索引。

span.span: The index of the first file converter to try when opening the file.

param.span: 首先尝试指定的文件转换器;如果此转换器无法识别该文件，则尝试所有其他转换器。

span.span: The specified file converter is tried first; if this converter doesn’t recognize the file, all other converters are tried.

param.span: 转换器索引由属性返回的转换器的行 号组成。

span.span: The converter index consists of the row numbers of the converters returned by the property.

param.name: AddToMru
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则将该工作簿添加到最近使用的文件列表中。

span.span: True to add this workbook to the list of recently used files.

param.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Local
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则以 Microsoft Excel（包括控制面板设置）的语言保存文件。

span.span: True saves files against the language of Microsoft Excel (including control panel settings).

param.span: 如果 (默认值) 则根据 Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) (（通常为美国英语）保存文件，除非运行 Workbooks.Open 的 VBA 项目是旧的国际化 XL5/95 VBA 项目) 。

span.span: False (default) saves files against the language of Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) (which is typically U.S. English unless the VBA project where Workbooks.Open is run from is an old internationalized XL5/95 VBA project).

param.name: CorruptLoad
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一：xlNormalLoad、xlRepairFile和xlExtractData。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlNormalLoad, xlRepairFile, and xlExtractData.

param.span: 如果未指定任何值，则默认行为通常是正常行为，但如果 Excel 已尝试打开文件，则可能是安全加载或数据恢复。

span.span: The default behavior if no value is specified is usually normal, but may be safe load or data recovery if Excel has already attempted to open the file.

param.span: 第一次尝试是正常的。

span.span: The first attempt is normal.

param.span: 如果 Excel 在打开文件时停止操作，则第二次尝试是安全加载。

span.span: If Excel stops operating while opening the file, the second attempt is safe load.

param.span: 如果 Excel 再次停止运行，则下一次尝试是数据恢复。

span.span: If Excel again stops operating, the next attempt is data recovery.
Opens a workbook.

para.span: 默认情况下，以编程方式打开文件时将启用宏。

span.span: By default, macros are enabled when opening files programmatically.

para.span: 使用 该属性可设置以编程方式打开文件时所使用的宏安全模式。

span.span: Use the property to set the macro security mode used when opening files programmatically.

param.name: BackgroundQuery
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 查询的背景。

span.span: The background of the query.

param.name: ImportDataAs

MemberSignature.Value: public void OpenText (string Filename, object Origin, object StartRow, object DataType, Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier TextQualifier = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote, object ConsecutiveDelimiter, object Tab, object Semicolon, object Comma, object Space, object Other, object OtherChar, object FieldInfo, object TextVisualLayout, object DecimalSeparator, object ThousandsSeparator, object TrailingMinusNumbers, object Local);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OpenText([in]string Filename, [in]object Origin, [in]object StartRow, [in]object DataType, [in]valuetype Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier TextQualifier, [in]object ConsecutiveDelimiter, [in]object Tab, [in]object Semicolon, [in]object Comma, [in]object Space, [in]object Other, [in]object OtherChar, [in]object FieldInfo, [in]object TextVisualLayout, [in]object DecimalSeparator, [in]object ThousandsSeparator, [in]object TrailingMinusNumbers, [in]object Local) runtime managed

Public Sub OpenText (Filename As String, Optional Origin As Object, Optional StartRow As Object, Optional DataType As Object, Optional TextQualifier As XlTextQualifier = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlTextQualifier.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote, Optional ConsecutiveDelimiter As Object, Optional Tab As Object, Optional Semicolon As Object, Optional Comma As Object, Optional Space As Object, Optional Other As Object, Optional OtherChar As Object, Optional FieldInfo As Object, Optional TextVisualLayout As Object, Optional DecimalSeparator As Object, Optional ThousandsSeparator As Object, Optional TrailingMinusNumbers As Object, Optional Local As Object)

param.name: Filename
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 指定要打开和分列的文本文件的名称。

span.span: Specifies the file name of the text file to be opened and parsed.

param.name: Origin
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定的文本文件来源。

span.span: Specifies the origin of the text file.

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一 ：xlMacintosh、xlWindows或xlMSDOS。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlMacintosh, xlWindows, or xlMSDOS.

param.span: 此外，这可以是表示所需代码页的代码页号的整数。

span.span: Additionally, this could be an integer representing the code page number of the desired code page.

param.span: 例如，“1256”将指定源文本文件的编码是阿拉伯语 (Windows)。

span.span: For example, "1256" would specify that the encoding of the source text file is Arabic (Windows).

param.span: 如果省略此参数，该方法将使用文本导入向导中的文件源选项 的当前设置。

span.span: If this argument is omitted, the method uses the current setting of the File Origin option in the Text Import Wizard.

param.name: StartRow
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 文本分析开始处的行号。

span.span: The row number at which to start parsing text.

param.span: 默认值为 1。

span.span: The default value is 1.

param.name: DataType
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 在文件中指定数据的列格式。

span.span: Specifies the column format of the data in the file.

param.span: 可以是下列常量之一 ：xlDelimited 或 xlFixedWidth。

span.span: Can be one of the following constants: xlDelimited or xlFixedWidth.

param.span: 如果未指定此参数，Microsoft Excel 将尝试在打开该文件时确定列格式。

span.span: If this argument is not specified, Microsoft Excel attempts to determine the column format when it opens the file.

param.name: TextQualifier
param.span: 可选 。

span.span: Optional .

param.span: 指定文本限定符。

span.span: Specifies the text qualifier.

param.span: 可以是其中一个 常量。xlTextQualifierDoubleQuote xlTextQualifierNonexlTextQualifierSingleQuote

span.span: Can be one of these constants.xlTextQualifierDoubleQuotexlTextQualifierNonexlTextQualifierSingleQuote

param.name: ConsecutiveDelimiter
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则将连续分隔符视为一个分隔符。

span.span: True to have consecutive delimiters considered one delimiter.

param.span: 默认值为 False 。

span.span: The default is False.

param.name: Tab
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真 若要将制表符作为分隔符 ( 必须xlDelimited) 。

span.span: True to have the tab character be the delimiter ( must be xlDelimited).

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Semicolon
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真若要将分号字符作为分隔符 ( 必须是xlDelimited) 。

span.span: True to have the semicolon character be the delimiter ( must be xlDelimited).

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Comma
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真要逗号字符作为分隔符 ( 必须 xlDelimited) 。

span.span: True to have the comma character be the delimiter ( must be xlDelimited).

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Space
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 真若要将空格字符作为分隔符 ( 必须 xlDelimited) 。

span.span: True to have the space character be the delimiter ( must be xlDelimited).

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: Other
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 如果为 True，则参数指定的字符必须是分隔符 ( xlDelimited) 。

span.span: True to have the character specified by the argument be the delimiter ( must be xlDelimited).

param.span: 默认值为 False。

span.span: The default value is False.

param.name: OtherChar
param.span: 如果 为 true (，则可选 对象) 。

span.span: Optional Object (required if is True).

param.span: 指定当为 True 时分隔 符字符。

span.span: Specifies the delimiter character when is True.

param.span: 如果指定了多个字符，则仅使用字符串中的第一个字符而忽略剩余字符。

span.span: If more than one character is specified, only the first character of the string is used; the remaining characters are ignored.

param.name: FieldInfo
param.span: 可选 。

span.span: Optional .

param.span: 包含各个数据列解析信息的数组。

span.span: An array containing parse information for individual columns of data.

param.span: 解释取决于 .

span.span: The interpretation depends on the value of .

param.span: 分隔数据时，此参数是一个双元素数组，每个双元素数组指定特定列的转换选项。

span.span: When the data is delimited, this argument is an array of two-element arrays, with each two-element array specifying the conversion options for a particular column.

param.span: 第一个元素是 (1 的列号) ，第二个元素是指定列分析方法的XlColumnDataType 常量之一。xlGeneralFormat 常规xlTextFormat TextxlMDYFormat MDY datexlDMYFormat DMY datexlYMDFormat YMD datexlMYDFormat MYD datexlDYMFormat DYM datexlYDMFormat YDM datexlEMDFormat EMD datexlSkipColumn Skip ColumnYou can use xlEMDFormat only if you have installed and selected Taiwanese language support.

span.span: The first element is the column number (1-based), and the second element is one of theXlColumnDataType constants specifying how the column is parsed.xlGeneralFormat GeneralxlTextFormat TextxlMDYFormat MDY datexlDMYFormat DMY datexlYMDFormat YMD datexlMYDFormat MYD datexlDYMFormat DYM datexlYDMFormat YDM datexlEMDFormat EMD datexlSkipColumn Skip ColumnYou can use xlEMDFormat only if you have installed and selected Taiwanese language support.

param.span: xlEMDFormat常量指定使用台湾地区纪元日期。列说明符可以按任意顺序。

span.span: The xlEMDFormat constant specifies that Taiwanese era dates are being used.The column specifiers can be in any order.

param.span: 如果输入数据中某个特定列没有列说明器，则使用"常规"设置分析该列。备注如果指定要跳过列，则必须显式声明其余所有列的类型，否则数据无法正确分析。如果数据中包含可识别的日期，则即使列设置为"常规"，单元格也会格式化为工作表中的日期。

span.span: If there's no column specifier for a particular column in the input data, the column is parsed with the General setting.NotesIf you specify that a column is to be skipped, you must explicitly state the type for all remaining columns or the data will not parse correctly.If there is a recognizable date in the data, the cell will be formatted as a date in the worksheet even if the setting for the column is General.

param.span: 此外，如果为列指定上述日期格式之一，并且数据不包含可识别的日期，则工作表中的单元格格式将为 General。如果源数据具有固定宽度的列，则每个双元素数组的第一个元素将起始字符在列 (中的位置指定为整数;字符 0 (为零) 为第一个字符) 。

span.span: Additionally, if you specify one of the above date formats for a column and the data does not contain a recognized date, then the cell format in the worksheet will be General.If the source data has fixed-width columns, the first element in each two-element array specifies the position of the starting character in the column (as an integer; character 0 (zero) is the first character).

param.span: 如上表中所列，双元素数组的第二个元素将列的解析选项指定为 0 到 9 之间的数字。

span.span: The second element in the two-element array specifies the parse option for the column as a number between 0 and 9, as listed in the preceding table.

param.name: TextVisualLayout
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 文本的可视布局。

span.span: The visual layout of the text.

param.name: DecimalSeparator
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 识别数字时，Microsoft Excel 使用的小数分隔符。

span.span: The decimal separator that Microsoft Excel uses when recognizing numbers.

param.span: 默认设置为系统设置。

span.span: The default setting is the system setting.

param.name: ThousandsSeparator
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 识别数字时，Excel 使用的千位分隔符。

span.span: The thousands separator that Excel uses when recognizing numbers.

param.span: 默认设置是系统设置。下表显示了针对各种导入设置将文本导入 Excel 的结果。

span.span: The default setting is the system setting.The following table shows the results of importing text into Excel for various import settings.

param.span: 数字结果显示在最右边的列中。

span.span: Numeric results are displayed in the rightmost column.

param.name: TrailingMinusNumbers
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.name: Local
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

summary.span: 使用包含已分析的文本文件数据的单个工作表加载和分析文本文件作为新工作簿。

span.span: Loads and parses a text file as a new workbook with a single sheet that contains the parsed text-file data.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook OpenXML (string Filename, object Stylesheets, object LoadOption);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.Workbook OpenXML([in]string Filename, [in]object Stylesheets, [in]object LoadOption) runtime managed
Public Function OpenXML (Filename As String, Optional Stylesheets As Object, Optional LoadOption As Object) As Workbook

param.name: Filename
param.span: 必需的 字符串 。

span.span: Required String.

param.span: 要打开的文件名。

span.span: The name of the file to open.

param.name: Stylesheets
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定要应用样式表处理指令的 XSL 转换 (一个值或) 数组。

span.span: Either a single value or an array of values that specify which XSL Transformation (XSLT) style sheet processing instructions to apply.

param.name: LoadOption
param.span: 可选 对象。

span.span: Optional Object.

param.span: 指定 Excel 打开 XML 数据文件的方式。

span.span: Specifies how Excel opens the XML data file.

param.span: 可以是以下常量之一 ：xlXmlLoadImportToList 将 XML 数据文件的内容提交到 XML 列表中。xlXmlLoadMapXml 在"XML 结构"任务窗格中显示 XML 数据文件的架构。xlXmlLoadOpenXml 打开 XML 数据文件。

span.span: Can be one of these constants:xlXmlLoadImportToList Places the contents of the XML data file in an XML list.xlXmlLoadMapXml Displays the schema of the XML data file in the XML Structure task pane.xlXmlLoadOpenXml Opens the XML data file.

param.span: 文件的内容将被平展。xlXmlLoadPromptUser 提示用户选择如何打开文件。

span.span: The contents of the file will be flattened.xlXmlLoadPromptUser Prompts the user to choose how to open the file.

summary.span: 打开一个 XML 数据文件。

span.span: Opens an XML data file.
Returns a object.

para.span: XML 功能（以 XML 电子表格格式保存文件除外）仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中可用。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

Public ReadOnly Property Parent As Object

summary.span: 返回指定对象的父对象。

span.span: Returns the parent object for the specified object.
Read-only.
